oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: The George Morgan Show - 1950-12-01 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: 1950-12-01 broadcast of The George Morgan Show, part 2. Featuring Grant Turner, The Jordanaires, Hank Garland, Tommy Jackson and Tony Lane (steel guitar), with guests Lonzo & Oscar. Part 1: http://cmfdigitization.cmf.int:2011/cdm/ref/collection/musicaudio/id/450
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: George Morgan; Jordanaires; Lonzo & Oscar; Tony Lane
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Beyond The Sunset (George Morgan) -- Dear Old Girl / I Want A Girl (Just Like The Girl That Married Dear Old Dad) (medley) (The Jordanaires) -- George Morgan reintroduces Lonzo & Oscar -- Sheepskin Corn And A Wrinkle On A Horn (Lonzo & Oscar) -- Panhandle Rag (Tony Lane steel guitar) -- I Wish I May I Wish I Might (George Morgan) -- Theme -- Closing statement (George Morgan) -- Closing statement (Grant Turner)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: George Morgan show (Radio program); Morgan, George, 1925-1975; Turner, Grant; Jordanaires (Musical group); Lonzo and Oscar
